prompts: Create a cute fairy-type Pokemon that resembles a dessert with a soft, creamy texture.
Show me a small, whimsical Pokemon that has a shape reminiscent of a dollop of whipped cream.
Imagine a sweet Pokemon that embodies the essence of joy and sweetness, with a soft glow.
Generate an adorable Pokemon that has a playful personality and a fluffy, cloud-like appearance.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a delicious treat, with a light and airy body.
Give me a small creature that brings happiness and is often found in magical gardens.
Make a Pokemon that has a gentle demeanor, resembling a tiny pastry with a touch of sparkle.
